Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.physics.component.collider

Record Class ColliderShapeTriangle

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
technology.sola.engine.physics.component.collider.ColliderShapeTriangle
Record Components:
shape - the triangle shape of this collider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ColliderShape<Triangle>
@NullMarked public record ColliderShapeTriangle(Triangle shape) extends Record implements ColliderShape<Triangle>
ColliderShapeTriangle is a ColliderShape implementation for a triangle which utilize a Triangle for its geometric shape representation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ColliderShapeTriangle()
    Creates a "unit triangle" collider shape with uniform side lengths of 1.
    ColliderShapeTriangle(Triangle shape)
    Creates an instance of a ColliderShapeTriangle record class.
